parameters.text:
=Pick the most interesting top 5 articles from the following and summarize into 1 or 2 lines:
{{ $json.articles }}

options.systemMessage: Output format: Order your output from 1 to 5 and include the link to the source after the 1 or 2 line summary.

articles.title: The market is betting staggering amounts on AI conjecture
articles.description: When investing in AI, keep your expectations in check. History suggests we should be cautious about assessing the impact of any technology
articles.content: Open this photo in gallery: Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai speaks at a Google I/O event in Mountain View, California in 2024. Earlier this month, the company paid US$2.4-billion to license technology from early stage AI star Windsurf.Jeff Chiu/The Associ... [6887 chars]

articles.title: Huawei shows off AI computing system to rival Nvidia’s top product
articles.description: Huawei has become widely regarded as China's most promising domestic supplier of chips essential for AI development, even though the company faces U.S. export restrictions.
articles.content: China’s Huawei Technologies showed off an AI computing system on Saturday that one industry expert has said rivals Nvidia’s most advanced offering, as the Chinese technology giant seeks to capture market share in the country’s growing artificial inte... [1813 chars]

articles.title: How Lovable became a successful AI-powered app builder
articles.description: Lovable, a Swedish AI startup, has surpassed $100 million in annual recurring revenue with over 2.3 million active users. Discover its journey of democratizing app development through innovative tools like GPT Engineer, enabling non-coders to create seamlessly.
articles.content: Lovable, a Swedish AI startup, has crossed $100 million in annual recurring revenue, putting it ahead of most other software firms, including OpenAI. Currently, the firm has more than 2.3 million active users, and last reported 180,000 paying subscri... [1629 chars]

articles.title: Competition shows humans are still better than AI at coding - just
articles.description: Przemysław Dębiak, who beat OpenAI at world finals, says he may be last human to win due to incredible pace of technological progress
articles.content:
Computers have taken the crown in chess, Go and poker, but when it comes to competitive coding, humans still have the edge – just.
Earlier this month Przemysław Dębiak, a Polish coder and mind sports champion, narrowly clinched a victory over OpenAI’... [2911 chars]

articles.title: I tried Gemini on my Galaxy Watch, and it completely changed how I use my phone
articles.description: An AI assistant on your wrist, perhaps, is the best way to keep the phone away. From reading emails to navigating the streets, Gemini on smartwatch comes in handy.
articles.content: A few weeks ago, Google announced that it is rolling out Gemini to WearOS-powered smartwatches from Pixel, Samsung, Oppo and OnePlus. The much-anticipated update brought Gemini to my wrist, which meant I no longer had to pull out my phone from my poc... [4547 chars]

articles.title: AI&US-‘It’s the most empathetic voice in my life’: How AI is transforming the lives of neurodivergent people
articles.description: However, since 2022, D’hotman has been a regular user of ChatGPT, the popular AI-powered chatbot from OpenAI, relying on it to overcome communication barriers at work and in her personal life.
articles.content:
* For full picture story, see here: https://reut.rs/40Aa2NB
